'''Freda''' is a [[Rohirrim|girl]] of [[Rohan]] who was sent to [[Edoras]] with her brother. Freda was invented by [[Warner Bros.]] for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' film series]], where she was portrayed by [[Olivia Tennet]].

==History==
Freda and her older brother [[Éothain (film character)|Éothain]] were sent by their mother [[Morwen (film character)|Morwen]] to alert [[Théoden|King Théoden]] that the [[Dunlendings|Wild Men]] were pillaging through [[Rohan]]. Éothain and Freda were kept safe at [[Edoras]] until Théoden led his people to [[Helm's Deep]], where they were reunited with their mother.
